body:
Comment 2 by **capnm9**: 
Looks like the expression is (at least partially) evaluated for int64
on 32 bit architecture.
 
It came up while I was looking at dave's benchmark (agree, hardly a real code):
for n := 0; n < b.N; n++ {
	for i, row := range a {
		for j, _ := range row {
			println(a[j][i])
			_ = a[i][j] / a[j][i]
		}
	}
}
